# List of awards and nominations received by Orson Scott Card

Orson Scott Card (born August 24, 1951) is an American writer known best for his science fiction works. , he is the only person to have won a Hugo Award and a Nebula Award in consecutive years, winning both awards for his novel ''Ender's Game (1985) and its sequel Speaker for the Dead'' (1986).
